text.data:
Anastasia: Did you know, [character][0x0]?
They say that when dragons mature they can become Master Dragons.
I heard that if you raise them until they become adults they'll become Master Dragons. I heard so from Barclay.[end]

Anastasia: Hey, [character][0x0], did you know?
I heard this from Barclay, he said that General Irvine of the Empire has Excalibur. Isn't that the legendary sword that every knight wants?
But Barclay only has axes...[end]
Ectarina: The Sweet Wine that he drank... Hee hee... This glass is mine...[end]
But... That letter... Who... From somebody here...?[end]
Ectarina: The cocktail spiked with special Uniuji that he drank... Hee hee... This glass is mine...[end]

Ectarina: The rip in the sky is the end of the world...
Hee hee... I'm on the same ship as him... Hee hee.[end]
Nelbo: Oh, [character][0x0]. Donfan, the enemy of women, wound up being trapped in here. Good idea, don't you think?[end]
Donfan: Important lesson!! Stay away from wizards![end]
Nelbo: Donfan... Here, have a Bad Cookie.[end]
Donfan: Which should I choose... I'm so confused...[end]

Frederica: Everybody is worried only about [character][0x1].
You're the only person to come see me, [character][0x0].
But that's okay... I have my medicine...[end]

Frederica: Why...
Why...
Oh... [character][0x0]... I can't stop shaking.
Oh...
M-medicine...[end]
Joy: Nelbo and I are keeping watch. Only when we're about to go into battle do we let him out.[end]
Donfan: Important lesson!! Stay away from priests![end]
Joy: Donfan... Here, have some Ice Grass.[end]
Diana: Hey, have you heard!? Have you!?[end]
What is it? Sorry, I'm busy right now.[end1]
Recently, there have been painful-sounding voices coming from [character][0x1]'s room. I wonder what it is... Could she be... I wonder if she's talking with the Holy Dragons...[end]

The other day, Matelite came by and asked what armor was currently popular. When I answered him, he then asked me what staffs were popular. There aren't any popular staffs, I told him! Then he asked what dresses were popular. His face was bright red.
Does he have strange hobbies or something, I wonder? What a weird man![end]
Hmm. I see...[end]

Jeanne: Donfan is pitiful. He does have a few good points, though.
But if I catch him looking at me...[end]
Donfan: Oh no, what should I do... What shall I do... This is the biggest crisis of my life![end]
Jeanne: Ah... alcohol... Donfan!! Bring some more drinks![end]
Donfan: Jeanne... 'Tis not good for you...[end]
Mist: I'm still not at full strength... Let me rest when we're not fighting...[end]
Tee hee hee... I'll sleep a lot to preserve my beautiful skin. It will help increase the number of my fans.[end]

Hmph! There are no good men on this ship.
Tee hee hee...!
I don't feel like getting up witter[end][end]
